description.narrative: For GGF funds will be used to support Allianza Biodiversidad (Biodiversity Alliance) (coordinated by Accion por la Biodiversidad) which strengthens partnerships between organizations and campaigns working to defend and enhance agricultural biodiversity in Latin America. The Alliance is working to support local communities, campesino organizations, and indigenous peoples in their efforts to promote agroecology by updating its website to better engage researchers, students, and activists in their work; researching and reporting on best practices used to resist large scale and unsustainable forms of agriculture and development; publishing a magazine related to their work in both Spanish and Portuguese; hosting a number of community workshops and meetings; and engaging in other collaboration and outreach activities.
